bill.title: An act relating to rural economic development
bill.description: An act relating to rural economic development

history.action: Read 1st time & referred to Committee on Natural Resources and Energy
Committee on Natural Resources and Energy relieved; bill committed to Committee on Agriculture on motion of Senator Campion
Entered on Notice Calendar
Favorable report with recommendation of amendment by Committee onAgriculture
Rules suspended & bill committed to Committee on Natural Resources and Energy with the report of Committee on Agriculture   intact, on motion of Senator Bray
Entered on Notice Calendar
Favorable report with recommendation of amendment by Committee onAgriculture
Favorable report with recommendation of amendment by Committee onNatural Resources and Energy
Referred to Committee on Finance per Senate Rule 31
Rules suspended & bill committed to Committee on Appropriations with the report of Committee on Agriculture & Natural Resources & Finance intact, on motion of Senator Cummings
Entered on Notice Calendar
Favorable report with recommendation of amendment by Committee onAgriculture

Favorable report with recommendation of amendment by Committee on Agriculture
Favorable report with recommendation of amendment by Committee on Natural Resources and Energy
Favorable report with recommendation of amendment by Committee on Finance
Favorable report with recommendation of amendment by Committee on Appropriations
Read second time, reported favorably with recommendation of amendment by Senator Pollina for Committee on Agriculture
Reported favorably by Senator Bray for Committee on Natural Resources and Energy with recommendation of amendment
Reported favorably by Senator Cummings for Committee on Finance with recommendation of amendment
Reported favorably by Senator Starr for Committee on Appropriations with recommendation of amendment
Recommendation of amendment by Committee on Agriculture amended as recommended by Committee on Natural Resources and Energy
Recommendation of amendment by Committee on Agriculture amended as recommended by Committee on Finance
Recommendation of amendment by Committee on Agriculture amended as recommended by Committee on Appropriations
Recommendation of amendment by Committee on Agriculture, as amended, agreed to
3rd reading ordered
New Business/Third Reading
Pending third reading, motion to amend to be offered by Senator(s) Bray
Pending third reading, bill amended as moved by Senator(s) Bray
Read 3rd time & passed
Read First Time and Referred to the Committee on Commerce and Economic Development

Rep. Hill of Wolcott moved that the committee on Commerce and Economic Development be relieved of the bill and that the same be committed to the committee on Agriculture and Forestry which was agreed to.
Referred to Committee on Ways and Means per Rule 35(a)
Referred to Committee on Appropriations per Rule 35(a)
Rules Suspended and Taken up for Immediate Consideration as moved by Rep. Turner of Milton
Read Second Time
Rep. Partridge of Windham reported for the committee on Agriculture and Forestry
Rep. Browning of Arlington recommended for the committee on Ways and Means
Report of the Committee on Agriculture and Forestry amended as recommended by the Committee on Ways and Means
Rep. Feltus of Lyndon recommended for the committee on Appropriations
Report of the Committee on Agriculture and Forestry amended as recommended by the Committee on Appropriations

Rep. Sibilia of Dover, Conquest of Newbury, Gannon of Wilmington, Jickling of Randolph, Keefe of Manchester, Kimbell of Woodstock, Pajala of Londonderry, and Young of Glover moved to amend the report of the committee on Agriculture and Forestry
Rep. Sibilia of Dover asked and was granted leave to withdraw amendment
Rep. Bartholomew of Hartland moved to amend the report of the committee on Agriculture and Forestry, which was agreed to.
Rep. Partridge of Windham moved to amend the report of the committee on Agriculture and Forestry, which was agreed to.
Report of Committee on Agriculture and Forestry as amended agreed to
Third Reading Ordered
Rules suspended and bill placed in all remaining stages of passage as moved by Rep. Turner of Milton
Read Third time and Passed in Concurrence with Proposal of Amendment
Rules suspended and bill messaged forthwith to the Senate as moved by Rep. Turner of Milton
House message House passed bill in concurrence with proposal(s) of amendment
Rules suspended & taken up for immediate consideration, on motion of Senator Ashe
House proposal of amendment; text
House proposal of amendment concurred in
As passed by Senate and House
Rules suspended & messaged to House forthwith, on motion of Senator Ashe
Senate Message, House proposal of amendment concurred in
Delivered to Governor on May 24, 2018
Signed by Governor on May 30, 2018
